Summary: large glowing orange colored light,moving north to south
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Cape Coral
There were 2 other sightings in Cape Coral on or around December 31st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my house watching the sky,as I am an avid sky watcher. I viewed a bright orange light ,approximatley 2500 ft above the ground,moving in a straight line accross the sky from the north toward me(south). It appeared to be moving slower than an airplane. Then seemed to appear to gain altitiude and become smaller as it got closer to my house. There was no noise.I called my room mates out to view it.They also saw it. It continued to move southward ,decreasing in size and then it disappeared.
